markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Catrina's Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=2361) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 30 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've adopted the calming presence of [catrinas](/Monsters.aspx?ID=768), the festive dead; you might have even danced with a catrina yourself! So long as you are visibly carrying fresh flowers or colorful ribbons somewhere on your person, you can cast [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31) twice per day as a 2nd-level divine innate spell.
name: Catrina's Presence

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Catrina's Presence Source Ancestry Guide pg. 30 2.0 --- You've adopted the calming presence of catrinas, the festive dead; you might have even danced with a catrina yourself! So long as you are visibly carrying fresh flowers or colorful ribbons somewhere on your person, you can cast calm emotions twice per day as a 2nd-level divine innate spell.
